I'm Chinmay Shewale, a backend engineer who is a bit lazy but loves building development tools to make my work easier and automate the workflow.

About Me

I'm currently a Student at IIIT Dharwad learning to buld cool things with my peers and the Open Source Community. I have been active on Tech Twitter and communities like EddieHub and WeMakeDevs .

As an engineer, I love building development tools which automate repetitive tasks and optimize my workflow. With this I became very fond of OPEN API facilitating data of network ‐ accessible service to all consumers. My passion for building development tools comes from a desire to save time and effort, so I can focus on more creative and complex tasks. I'm always looking for new ways to improve the development process and love collaborating with my team to get feedback and ideas.

When I'm not in front of a computer screen, I'm probably in the Gym, goofing around with my friends, or enjoying my meal.

Other Projects
Remind_meThis

Remind_methis is a Twitter Bot to remind the user to read the tweets at a specified time by the user and also to save and view tweets with various tags to keep the resources organised.

NodeJS ExpressJS Webhooks Twitter API MongoDB
Musistic

Musistic is a social media platform for music lovers to connect and interact!

TypeScript NodeJs ExpressJS Spotify API NextJS MongoDB
Remind_methis - Serverless

Remind_methis is a Twitter Bot built in serverless framework to deploy on AWS using lambda functions to remind the user to read the tweets at a specified time by the user and also to save and view tweets with various tags to keep the resources organised.

NodeJS ExpressJS Twitter API Webhooks AWS Lambda MongoDB
Google-Drive APIs

Used Google API to use the drive functionality for upload download and delete files using it as cloud storage
